Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.impl

Class EditorTextFieldRendererDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.util.UserDataHolderBase
      • com.intellij.openapi.editor.impl.EditorTextFieldRendererDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Document, DocumentEx, UserDataHolder, UserDataHolderEx

    public class EditorTextFieldRendererDocument
extends UserDataHolderBase
implements DocumentEx
    Read-only document optimized for rendering of millions of EditorTextFields. The only mutating method is setText() which is extremely cheap.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.editor.Document

      • getModificationStamp

        public long getModificationStamp()
        Description copied from interface: Document
        Gets the modification stamp value. Modification stamp is a value changed by any modification of the content of the file. Note that it is not related to the file modification time.
        Specified by:
        getModificationStamp in interface Document
        Returns:
        the modification stamp value.
        See Also:

      • createRangeMarker

        public RangeMarker createRangeMarker(int startOffset,
                                     int endOffset,
                                     boolean surviveOnExternalChange)
        Description copied from interface: Document
        Creates a range marker which points to the specified range of text in the document and is automatically adjusted when the document text is changed. The marker is optionally invalidated by external changes to the document text (for example, reloading the file from disk).
        Specified by:
        createRangeMarker in interface Document
        Parameters:
        startOffset - the start offset for the range of text covered by the marker.
        endOffset - the end offset for the range of text covered by the marker.
        surviveOnExternalChange - if true, the marker is not invalidated by external changes.
        Returns:
        the marker instance.

      • createGuardedBlock

        public RangeMarker createGuardedBlock(int startOffset,
                                      int endOffset)
        Description copied from interface: Document
        Marks a range of text in the document as read-only (attempts to modify text in the range cause ReadOnlyFragmentModificationException to be thrown).
        Specified by:
        createGuardedBlock in interface Document
        Parameters:
        startOffset - the start offset of the text range to mark as read-only.
        endOffset - the end offset of the text range to mark as read-only.
        Returns:
        the marker instance.
        See Also:
        Document.removeGuardedBlock(RangeMarker), Document.startGuardedBlockChecking(), EditorActionManager.setReadonlyFragmentModificationHandler(com.intellij.openapi.editor.actionSystem.ReadonlyFragmentModificationHandler)
